org.corfudb.runtime.object.transactions

Class SnapshotTransactionalContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.object.transactions.AbstractTransactionalContext
      • org.corfudb.runtime.object.transactions.SnapshotTransactionalContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<AbstractTransactionalContext>

    public class SnapshotTransactionalContext
extends AbstractTransactionalContext
    A snapshot transactional context.

    Given the snapshot (log address) given by the TransactionBuilder, access all objects within the same snapshot during the course of this transactional context.

    Created by mwei on 11/22/16.
